title: Fleshrender
content:
Fleshrender Rare 3~8 Damage 1d6 +2 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The previous owner was going to call this sword Barney, but he got such a bollocking from his friends that he named it Fleshrender instead, and sulked for a whole tenday afterward. Shortsword Light Finesse 0.9 190

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:
